name: vivliostyle
description: Library for web sites with rich paged viewing and EPUB support, shared with Vivliostyle Formatter & Browser

scripts.build: mkdirp lib && java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in ECMASCRIPT5 --warning_level VERBOSE --output_wrapper_file src/wrapper.js --externs src/externs.js --process_common_js_modules --hide_warnings_for node_modules/fast-diff/diff.js --js_output_file lib/vivliostyle.min.js src/closure/goog/base.js src/closure/goog/*/*.js src/adapt/*.js src/vivliostyle/*.js plugins/*/src/*.js node_modules/hypher/lib/hypher.js node_modules/fast-diff/diff.js
scripts.typecheck: java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler/compiler.jar --checks_only --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in ECMASCRIPT5 --warning_level VERBOSE --externs src/externs.js --process_common_js_modules --hide_warnings_for node_modules/fast-diff/diff.js src/closure/goog/base.js src/closure/goog/*/*.js src/adapt/*.js src/vivliostyle/*.js plugins/*/src/*.js node_modules/hypher/lib/hypher.js node_modules/fast-diff/diff.js

author: Vivliostyle Inc.
